name: 443fcd61-345e-5571-8753-b0f1604d5816
notes: This service provides filter absorption photometer measurements of volume absorption coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles observed at Observatoire Perenne de l'Environnement, France (20120101 - 20170101). The observations contain level 2 data. The time resolution is 1h. The observations are stored in the EBAS database (http://ebas.nilu.no/).
title: Measurements of volume absorption coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles at Observatoire Perenne de l'Environnement, France (20120101 - 20170101)
